posts.description: Atmasphere, a brand new yoga and fitness lifestyle concept launching in Atlanta, will open the doors to its first-ever studio in the Buckhead community on Friday, April 15! Located at 3097 Piedmont Road N.E. in a two-story, 10,000 square-foot building, Atmasphere will offer an environment that ignites the union of mind, body and soul through its accessible offerings. The new studio warmly...
posts.title: Atmasphere Grand Opening April 15

posts.author: Julie Wolfe
posts.description: ATLANTA — A City of Atlanta employee was killed in Buckhead Monday morning after he was hit by a falling tree.It happened around 10:30 a.m. on Springlake Dr. NW. A release from the city of Atlanta identified the worker as Donald Rembert, who was an employee with the city for 29 years. He was most recently working with the forestry team in the Department of Parks and Recreation...
posts.title: City employee killed by falling tree in Buckhead

posts.author: 11Alive News Staff
posts.description: CORRECTION: 11Alive has learned that officials are now saying the woman injured in the fire was 37-years-old, not elderly as previously reported. ATLANTA — A 37-year-old woman pulled from a burning Buckhead apartment building Sunday has died.Atlanta Fire and Rescue told 11Alive the two-alarm fire broke out shortly after 4 a.m. at the Pharr Manor apartments on Pharr Road.According...
posts.title: Woman dies after Buckhead apartment fire

posts.author: Michael H. King
posts.description: ATLANTA (WXIA) – Atlanta Police said they were looking for a home intruder who sexually assaulted a young girl at a Buckhead apartment Monday evening.Investigators from the Atlanta Police Department’s Major Crimes Unit were summoned to a unit at the 32 Hundred Apartments in Buckhead after receiving reports of the sexual assault on Monday.The girl said that when she was lying in bed, she...
posts.title: Home intruder gropes young girl in Buckhead apartment

posts.author: 11Alive News Staff
posts.description: ATLANTA -- Atlanta police told 11Alive on Saturday that a locally-based rapper was in no way connected to a crime at an area bank the previous day.Police briefly detained Sam Benson - a rapper who goes by the name "Blac Youngsta" - after he left the Wells Fargo Branch in the 3200 block of Peachtree Road in Atlanta. However he was soon released and the real suspect was...
posts.title: Atlanta police respond after detaining rapper leaving bank
